This app is sure to delight your kids!Is your kid fascinated with police cars and police activities?  If so, this app is for you.  Use your picture (or take a new picture of yourself or anyone) to create your own police badge, drive a police car, ring the siren, help children cross the street, catch a robber, check for speed as cars drive by using a speed gun, play with a K-9, and much more.  This app enables kids to be a policeman and go through various activities in a storybook-like and a game-like setting.  This app is full of exciting, interactive activities and sounds that your kids will love.Kids Police is made by a parent, tested and approved by a policeman.Features:â¢	Create a police ID/badge using an existing or newly taken picture.â¢	Look inside the police station, ring the alarm and make police cars produce sounds.â¢	Dress a policeman and put on a police hat.â¢	Drive a police car.â¢	Control the steering wheel, sound the siren, etc.â¢	Help children cross the street.â¢	Use the policemanâs speed gun to check the speed as cars pass by.â¢	Catch a robber. See how many you can catch â in a game-like fashion.â¢	Train a K-9 â play a game of jump over obstacles and then feed the dog afterwards.
